text: Uta (Uda) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 8,604 people lived there. Its area is 134.71 kmÂ². It is 6 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Uta, Sardinia
